name: RevokeUserRole
description:
Remove roles from a specified user in the system.

Use this tool to revoke one or more roles assigned to a user by specifying their user ID. It's useful for updating user permissions in the system.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier or name of the user from whom roles will be revoked.

parameters.name: roles_to_revoke
parameters.description: A list of roles to be removed from the specified user. Provide each role as a string in the array.

value_schema.description: The roles to revoke from the specified user.

parameters.name: user_type
parameters.description: Specify the user type: `db` for Weaviate-managed or `oidc` for external OIDC-managed users.

value_schema.description: The type of the user. `db` users are managed by Weaviate, `oidc` users are managed by an external OIDC provider.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: The roles to revoke from the specified user.

value_schema.description: The roles to revoke from the specified user.

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: The type of the user. `db` users are managed by Weaviate, `oidc` users are managed by an external OIDC provider.

value_schema.description: The type of the user. `db` users are managed by Weaviate, `oidc` users are managed by an external OIDC provider.
